name: What's In My Rug
description:
What’s in my Rug is a chaos-driven stealth game about a clumsy, overworked woman that accidentally killed her boss and has to get rid of the body without her coworkers noticing.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
What's in my Rug, initially pitched as What's in my Bag, is the resulting product of a game development project executed during the 5th semester of the course Animation&Game at h_da Highschool of Applied Sciences in Darmstadt, Germany.

Development Time: ~ 4 months (April '21 - July '21)
